chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Let brotherly love continue.
items.plainText: Let brotherly love continue.

items.text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers: for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.
items.plainText: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers: for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.

items.text: Remember them that are in bonds, as bound with them; and them which suffer adversity, as being yourselves also in the body.
items.plainText: Remember them that are in bonds, as bound with them; and them which suffer adversity, as being yourselves also in the body.

items.text: Marriage is honourable in all, and the bed undefiled: but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge.
items.plainText: Marriage is honourable in all, and the bed undefiled: but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge.

items.text: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
items.plainText: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.

items.text: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
items.plainText: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.

items.text: Remember them which have the rule over you, who have spoken unto you the word of God: whose faith follow, considering the end of their conversation.
items.plainText: Remember them which have the rule over you, who have spoken unto you the word of God: whose faith follow, considering the end of their conversation.

items.text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
items.plainText: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.

items.text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines. For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace; not with meats, which have not profited them that have been occupied therein.
items.plainText: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines. For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace; not with meats, which have not profited them that have been occupied therein.

items.text: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.
items.plainText: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.

items.text: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp.
items.plainText: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp.

items.text: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate.
items.plainText: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate.

items.text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.
items.plainText: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.

items.text: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
items.plainText: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.

items.text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
items.plainText: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.

items.text: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.
items.plainText: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.

items.text: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit yourselves: for they watch for your souls, as they that must give account, that they may do it with joy, and not with grief: for that is unprofitable for you.
items.plainText: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit yourselves: for they watch for your souls, as they that must give account, that they may do it with joy, and not with grief: for that is unprofitable for you.

items.text: Pray for us: for we trust we have a good conscience, in all things willing to live honestly.
items.plainText: Pray for us: for we trust we have a good conscience, in all things willing to live honestly.

items.text: But I beseech you the rather to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.
items.plainText: But I beseech you the rather to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.

items.text: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant,
items.plainText: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant,

items.text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
items.plainText: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

items.text: And I beseech you, brethren, suffer the word of exhortation: for I have written a letter unto you in few words.
items.plainText: And I beseech you, brethren, suffer the word of exhortation: for I have written a letter unto you in few words.

items.text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty; with whom, if he come shortly, I will see you.
items.plainText: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty; with whom, if he come shortly, I will see you.

items.text: Salute all them that have the rule over you, and all the saints. They of Italy salute you.
items.plainText: Salute all them that have the rule over you, and all the saints. They of Italy salute you.

items.text: Grace be with you all. Amen.
items.plainText: Grace be with you all. Amen.
